Even with its steep learning curve, competitive nature, and sometimes toxic fanbase, [i]Dead By Daylight[/i] is still currently the most refined experience of asymmetrical multiplayer horror.

When I first played this game by myself, I didn't know what I was getting myself into. As a self-proclaimed veteran of classic survival horror games like Resident Evil, Siren, Fatal Frame, and Clock Tower, I thought my prior knowledge of cat-and-mouse, run-and-hide games would help me. Spoiler alert; it didn't.

After a brief hiatus, I came back and played with some friends and my experience went from rage-inducing to actually fun. It wasn't until I took the extra time to watch other players on YouTube and learn their techniques, how to utilize perks to the fullest, and also to play as the Killer occasionally which in turn will make you a better survivor.

I'm also a fan of the character design, especially the Killers. It's amazing that this game also holds licensing to some iconic characters and gives them new life. This game gets updated periodically, and it usually feels like a big event that you and your squad will want to hop on together and see what's been changed.

For new players this game may be intimidating, but if you're willing to take the time and learn the mechanics and not get discouraged after dying a lot in the beginning, you'll be rewarded with a fun, yet challenging experience and memorable matches.

And again, I [i]highly[/i] recommend playing together with good friends in the beginning if you can. It'll make the learning process way more fun.

This game is one the worst game I have ever played. The idea seems great but as always the devs are always thinking in making money instead of solving the game issues. I have played both killer and survivor. Killer is quite boring for me since is quite easy to dominate. The problem is that you can't play survivor most of the time since it depends on the killer if everyone is going to have fun. Since the game can be easy broken in favour of the killer if he wants to and be boring for everyone with slugging, camping, tunneling, holding the game hostage, sweaty builds. Killers mains take this casual and easy game as a competition for no reason in order to """"win"""" a pointless nothing. So the only way to have fun in this game is being a killer and letting others have the game they deserve. Pls don't buy anything from them.
